title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), the scrollbars appear to be enabled and movable. However, they do not have any effect when moved. This can be misleading, especially when opening a small image such as an icon, as the scrollbars do not provide any functionality.
OB:
Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
Notice the scrollbars are enabled, and you can move them around, but they don't have any effect. If you open a small image, like an icon, the scrollbars are just misleading because they don't do anything.
EB: The scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example.
